mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT_BOARD (PBO_SEQ, USER_ID, PBO_TITLE, PBO_CONTENT, PBO_REGDATE, PRJ_ID) VALUES( 'PROJECTBOARD_' || PROJECTBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{pboTitle}, #{pboContent}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{prjId})
mapper.select: SELECT pb.PBO_SEQ, pb.USER_ID, pb.PBO_TITLE, pb.PBO_CONTENT, pb.PBO_PROGRESS, pb.PBO_DELFLAG, pb.PBO_REGDATE, pb.PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_BOARD pb WHERE pb.PRJ_ID = #{prj_id} AND pb.PBO_PROGRESS = #{pbo_progress}
